Name: Altered
About the game: Altered is a meditative puzzle game mixing hard puzzles and a soothing atmosphere. Explore a mysterious world filled with challenging puzzles solving them by altering your characters in multiple ways, forcing you to think outside the box. Take your time and solve at your own pace, as you make your way through. Challenge yourself by solving one of over 80 puzzles, with the twist of altering each character using their unique powers. By understanding their powers, you will gain new intuition for solving interesting puzzles. Altered was selected to the Copenhagen Game Collective Yonderplay Showcase at the 2019 Nordic Game Conference.
Meta Title: Altered: Mar 12, 2021, Glitchheart and Full Overview
